name: Broncherry Aqua

aura.name: overaffectionate
aura.description: Can be ridden. While in team, Broncherry helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

description: Its scent drastically changes before and after pairing. It exudes a pleasing aroma before finding a partner, which is called the "perfume of purity."

skills.name: aqua_gun
skills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

skills.name: bubble_blast
skills.description: Fires numerous bubbles that slowly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: muscle_slam
skills.description: Broncherry's exclusive skill. Turns sideways before tackling enemies in front of it, sending them flying into the air.

skills.name: seed_mine
skills.description: Launches a deadly seed. If it hits an enemy, the seed explodes.

skills.name: spine_vine
skills.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

skills.name: aqua_burst
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: hydro_laser
skills.description: Shoots pressurized water at extreme velocities, sweeping over a wide area in front of it.
